mapper.sql: LOG_ID, RUNNING_IP, RUNNING_TYPE,LOG_CONTENT, RUNNING_RESULT,FAILURE_CAUSE, CREATE_TIME, TIMESTAMP
mapper.insert: insert into xnote_log_running_client (log_id, running_ip, running_type, running_result, create_time, timestamp, log_content, failure_cause) values (#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runningType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runningResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{failureCause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

log_id,

mapper.update:
update xnote_log_running_client
running_ip = #{runningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
running_type = #{runningType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
running_result = #{runningResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
log_content = #{logContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
failure_cause = #{failureCause,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
